text: Judy Valerie Cornwell (born 22 February 1940) is an English actress. Cornwell is best known for her role as Daisy in the British sitcom Keeping Up Appearances. She played Anya Claus in the 1985 movie Santa Claus: The Movie. == Other websites == * Judy Cornwell on IMDb Category:1940 births Category:Living people
title: Judy Cornwell
